query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) not null, [LineNumber] int not null, [CorrespondentAndContractNumber] nvarchar(max) null, [RegistrationDataAndSubject] nvarchar(max) null, [AddressIndex] nvarchar(max) null, [Region] nvarchar(max) null, [City] nvarchar(max) null, [Address] nvarchar(max) null, [BussinesUnit] nvarchar(max) null, [DeliveryMethod] nvarchar(max) null, [ReturnAddress] nvarchar(max) null, [Weight] nvarchar(max) null, [Rating] nvarchar(max) null, [Phone] nvarchar(max) null)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId varchar(256) not null, LineNumber integer not null, CorrespondentAndContractNumber citext null, RegistrationDataAndSubject citext null, AddressIndex citext null, Region citext null, City citext null, Address citext null, BussinesUnit citext null, DeliveryMethod citext null, ReturnAddress citext null, Weight citext null, Rating citext null, Phone citext null);

query.default: select LineNumber, CorrespondentAndContractNumber, RegistrationDataAndSubject, AddressIndex, Region, City, Address, BussinesUnit, DeliveryMethod, ReturnAddress, Weight, Rating, Phone from lenspec_Reports_RusPost where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by LineNumber;
